rooms.description: Open-concept living space with seating area and dining zone, designed in accordance with Vastu principles ensuring positive energy flow.
Adjacent to the kitchen for communal meals, optimized for social interactions and ease of access. Designed following Vastu guidelines.
Spacious master bedroom with south-facing window for health benefits as per Vastu norms; includes attached bathroom.
Additional bedroom designed to provide privacy and comfort. Placed in a calm location ensuring positive energy flow.
Modern kitchen with an island, adjacent to dining area; includes provisions for natural light and ventilation as per local building norms.
Master bathroom attached to the master bedroom; designed with ample storage space.
Separate living space for household staff; includes a small kitchenette and a separate toilet facility as per local norms.
For servants' quarters or guest usage; designed with practicality in mind.

openings.description: Main entrance door with an inviting vestibule, aligning with Vastu principles for entry.
Large window in the living room and bedrooms to allow natural light and positive energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
Strategically placed windows for cross ventilation, ensuring compliance with local building codes.
